title: First impressions: a journey to the Pilbara, Western Austral
creator_credit: Perth Institute of Film and Television, Paul D. Barron, Paul Barron and David Rapsey
brief_description: Documents the ideas, stages and techniques involved in the creation of German-born Jorg Schmeisser’s etchings in the north west of Western Australia and their final execution in his studio in Canberra. The creative process is as much about Jorg’s relationship to the etching plate as with his interaction with the landscape.
